campaign_brief.sample_headlines: See, Hear, Experience: Nuance Audio Glasses Demo - Book Yours Now!

campaign_brief.value_propositions: Simplifies the online glasses buying process, eliminates decision fatigue, and provides personalized recommendations based on individual needs and preferences.
